description: Application to modify a planning obligation (S106 Agreement) following a grant of planning permission: P092492 dated 17/11/2010 (and latest s73: P2020/3101/S73 with Deed of Variation) for "Demolition of existing buildings and the construction of a mixed use development comprising 2 (two) 21 (twenty one) storey buildings above ground and first floor plinth; 10 (ten) storey building above ground and first floor plinth; and 3 (three) storey building above ground floor plinth for: 335 (three hundred and thirty five) residential dwellings (Use Class C3); 2172 (two thousand one hundred and seventy two) sq.m. (GEA) of office floor space (Use Class B1); 436 (four hundred and thirty six) sq.m (GEA) of restaurant and caf√© floor space (Use Class A3); 9665 (nine thousand six hundred and sixty five) sq.m (GEA) of flexible floor space for uses within Use Classes A 1 - A4 and / or gym (Use Class D2) and / or including up to 2000 (two thousand) sq.m (GEA) of office floor space (Use Class B 1) at first floor only; together with associated disabled and car club parking spaces, cycle spaces, storage, associated access, public realm and private and public amenity space". The modification being to amend the ground floor Plan 3 relating to public open space on site.
